article_title: As Kevin McCarthy Withdraws From Speaker Race, Can Anyone Lead The House Republicans?

article_metadata.author: Avik S. A. Roy

og.description: Video WASHINGTON, DC - OCTOBER 08: U.S. House Majority Leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) speaks to members of the press as his wife Judy looks on after a closed House Republican election meeting to pick the next GOP House Speaker nominee October 8, 2015 on Capitol Hill in Washington, DC.
